common

类 Common

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.Common

  • public class Common
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides basic settings along with some other important data for the whole project.
    Project: Three-way conversational recommendation.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/TCR.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String configurationFilename
      The system configuration filename.
      static long endTime
      The end time of the program/subroutine.
      static boolean ifDebug
      To specify if the system is under debug, and avoid debugging output appear in formal versions.
      static java.lang.String ProjectHeader
      The project header appears in any files generated.
      static java.util.Properties property
      Properties read from the configuration file.
      static java.util.Random random
      The random object.
      static java.lang.String rootDirectory
      Help the relative directory.
      static long runSteps
      The number of steps for running.
      static long runtimes
      The run times the program/subroutine.
      static boolean somethingChanged
      Anything changed?
      static long startTime
      The start time of the program/subroutine.

      The file name of Sub-reduct
      static java.lang.String unspecifiedString
      Unspecifed value.

      • loadConfiguration

        public static void loadConfiguration()
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Initialize. Read the configuration data from the system configuration file.
        抛出:

      • storeConfiguration

        public static void storeConfiguration()
                               throws java.lang.Exception

        抛出:

        Exit system. No exception is thrown.
